snippet: Mr. Specter was at the center of many of the Senate’s most divisive legal battles, only to lose his seat in 2010 after quitting the Republican Party to become a Democrat.
abstract: Arlen Specter, senator from Pennsylvania who was at the center of many of the Senate's most divisive legal battles, only to lose the seat he had held for more than 30 years after quitting the Republican Party to become a Democrat, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Specter was at the center of many of the Senate’s most divisive legal battles, only to lose his seat in 2010 after quitting the Republican Party to become a Democrat.
